text:
QUESTION 02) MILLENNIALS: ASía La Generación that ya no retired was the world sin sin some llaman generación y, other "millennials", generación del millennio the inclusive "echo boomers".
Nacieron y crecieron en una was rapidly desarrollo de las nuevas technologies, y casi in the retiredan cum era the world sin internet.
Son idealistic, impatient and strictly prepared academically prepared. Muchos de Ellos Han Tenido opportunities to travel through the world the edad temprana, to study universities and to work in multinational companies and extranjeras.
La Generación Y components this type of personas that quieren all over time. In this disputes to bore the work of the Interesting Poco Y Rutinario, at Quieren Dejar Las Cosas Buenas to Luego. So they are to dejar su huella en la history, to vivir an interesting life, to form part of something big, to believe y dearrollarse, to shive the world that les surrounds, y in the soil ganar dinero.
The text points to characteristics and interests of “generation Y”. In it, the expression dejar su huella refers to one of the desires of this generation, which is that of
A) Know different places.
B) Make a difference in the world.
C) Take every opportunity.
D) obtain an academic formation of excellence.
E) Win good places in the world of work.
